title: Certified Surgical Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Archbold Medical Center (Thomasville, GA) in May 2022
Interview Descriptions: Average employees were really nice and explained everything in detail in terms of the hiring process and what to expect. Hospital is very friendly. Easy to get around. Employees have lots of discounts and incentives
Interview Questions: What was an issue you ere faced with at your last job and how did u handle it?

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Archbold Medical Center (Cairo, GA) in Sept 2020
Interview Descriptions:
Phone call to set up.
I was Interviewed in person.  I went to the location and met with interviewer.   I Was asked questions about my previous experience and I was told what would be expected of me and  they explained my duties.  Benefits were examined and I asked questions.

title: Patient Care Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Archbold Medical Center (Thomasville, GA) in Apr 2018
Interview Descriptions: Interview process took forever. From interview to hire it took a month. And I was told I would receive a call the day after my interview to receive an offer and I had to call because the managers got confused on who was supposed to call me.

title: Licensed Practical Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Archbold Medical Center (Thomasville, GA) in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: The two ladies were very friendly and not only answered questions, but discussed their love of nursing as well! They took turns explaining the hiring process, pay rate, and what I should expect once employed at the facility I applied to. By far, this was the best interview I have ever gone to!

title: Patient Care Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Archbold Medical Center (Thomasville, GA) in Nov 2015
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was smooth. There were hardly any delays in processing of my application.  HR got back with in a timely manner, and I was working in no time.

title: Operations Director Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Archbold Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: Initially had a phone interview with the hiring manager followed by an in-person interview with department personnel and ancillary positions. Everyone was extremely open and supportive throughout the interview. Also very open about room for improvement within the division as well as their plans for the future. They mostly focused on asking things about background and work experience.

title: Systems Analyst III Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Archbold Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: Dress business professional and do your research about the health system before your interview.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Archbold Medical Center (Thomasville, GA) in Apr 2014
Interview Descriptions: I was scheduled to meet with 4 different nurse managers. Only one showed up to the interview. I thought that very unprofessional. I was never told why the other managers didn't show up, and the HR employee kept stating we would wait on the others. Apparently, no one knew why no one showed up. That should have been a sign from the start.
Interview Questions: Why did you apply for the position at AMC?

title: Benefits Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Archbold Medical Center (Thomasville, GA) in Aug 2013
Interview Descriptions: I spent time with each person on the team.  It was definitely a two way street on the interview process which is nice.  Its important as the interviewee to know the people you will work with.  Everyone was very welcoming and interested in what I had to say.  Since I was from out of town, they had a welcome package waiting for me at the hotel - loved that little touch!

title: Delivery Room Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 months. I interviewed at Archbold Medical Center (Thomasville, GA) in Aug 2012
Interview Descriptions: I applied for the position online and was contacted a few months later for an interview.  I went to the interview and was pleasantly surprised by the experience.  My interviewer was very polite and interested in not only my past job experiences but me as a person.  We spent about 30-45 minutes talking casually about the position and life.  I was informed of the salary and the benefits.  I was very impressed at the benefits offered, but not so much about the pay.  I was contacted a week later and was told the position had been filled.  I asked what was the deciding factor and was told that the other person had more experience than I did.

title: Deputy Registrery Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Archbold Medical Center (Thomasville, GA) in Oct 2008
Interview Descriptions: Questions about the position applied for,tests,work history,old jobs.
Interview Questions: Watched a video about the history of the hospital.
